sections.title: Overview
sections.content: Cross-platform mobile app using React Native with offline-first and push notifications.

sections.title: UX States
sections.content: Empty/loading/error/success with native patterns; retry flows; accessibility gestures.

sections.title: Offline & Sync
sections.content: Local storage, conflict resolution, background sync, bandwidth-aware behavior.

sections.title: Performance & A11y
sections.content: 60fps targets, memory and battery constraints; screen reader testing; dynamic type support.
